name: edgelambdas
description: Lambda edge functions to refine the behaviour of our Cloud SPA

scripts.defaultDocument: cross-env DEV_CONFIG=local sls invoke local -f defaultDocument -p test/defaultDocument.json
scripts.securityHeaders: cross-env DEV_CONFIG=local sls invoke local -f securityHeaders -p test/securityHeaders.json
scripts.authorizationCodeGrant: cross-env DEV_CONFIG=local sls invoke local -f reverseProxy -p test/authorizationCodeGrant.json
scripts.refreshTokenGrant: cross-env DEV_CONFIG=local sls invoke local -f reverseProxy -p test/refreshTokenGrant.json
scripts.expireRefreshToken: cross-env DEV_CONFIG=local sls invoke local -f reverseProxy -p test/expireRefreshToken.json
scripts.clearCookies: cross-env DEV_CONFIG=local sls invoke local -f reverseProxy -p test/clearCookies.json

author: Gary Archer
